IIDDA API R Package

The iidda.api package is used to get data through the API for the International Infectious Disease Data Archive (IIDDA), and can be installed with the following R command.

Installation 

install.packages("iidda.api"
  , repos = c(
      "https://canmod.r-universe.dev"
    , "https://cran.r-project.org"
  )
)
